Bubbles are positive wealth redistribution events. Bitcoin redistributed global wealth towards cognizant early-adopters that now have plenty financial and social capital to realize their vision. It's fair that Bubble Seller foresight is paid for by Bubble Buyer short-sightedness.
Julie VerHage-Greenberg
@julieverhage
 · Nov 28, 2018
UBS on the fall in Bitcoin: There is some good news. The time, effort and electricity that built the bubble can now be used to do something useful. Giving money to cryptocurrency creators was not useful. Getting skilled people to do something useful boosts the economy. @crypto
